sentence.Network_en: Palm Springs has ritzy restaurants and glitzy nightlife.
sentence.Network_cn: 棕榈泉有高档的餐厅和奢华的夜生活。

sentence.Network_en: I guess it's real soul - inspiring to work in a ritzy layout like this.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想在陈设这么豪华的地方工作一定心旷神怡吧.

sentence.Network_en: Dad said he was propositioned by a call girl at the ritzy hotel.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲说他在豪华饭店时曾有应召女郎找上他.

2012年9月上海高级口译考试Note taking AND... ... etiquette n. 礼节，礼仪; ritzy adj. 豪华的，高级的; ambience n. 气氛.

list.abs: 豪华牌手表 Heuer豪华大酒店 ritzy hotel豪华的旅店 plush hotel~posh hotel
ritzy wind is cast people thinking they follow the competition that carry Cheng is to be destined to want to fail .势利的风投们认为他们跟携程竞争是注定要失败的。
Wow ! What a ritzy outfit !, 哇 ! 多麽华丽的服装!
We went to this ritzy Greek restaurant ., 我们去了那家豪华的希腊饭店.

entry.def: If you describe something as ritzy, you mean that it is fashionable or expensive.

example.ex: Palm Springs has ritzy restaurants and glitzy nightlife.
example.tran: 棕榈泉有高档的餐厅和奢华的夜生活。
